details: The script uses GATK (Genome Analysis Toolkit) for variant calling and analysis.
It utilizes several GATK tools, including:
The script also uses bcftools for concatenating VCF files.
It runs on a PBS (Portable Batch System) cluster with specific resource requests:
The script requires a reference genome (ucsc.hg19.fasta) and GATK resources (mills, axiomPoly, dbsnp).
It uses a specified workspace path for GenomicsDBImport and a temporary directory (/home/sylee/tmp).
The script has several loops that process multiple VCF files.
It uses specific Java options to manage memory allocation.
